data.text: Aa malo mondo irieny nikech lerni osechopo,
Neye mudho okwako piny,
Ogendini nobi, e lerni,
Tingʼ wangʼi malo kingʼiyo koni gi koni:
Eka inine mano mi inibed mamor
Kweth mag ngamia nopongʼ pinyi,
Jamni duto mag Kedar nochokni,
Magi to gin angʼo mafuyo ka boche polo,
Kuom adiera pinje manie dho nembe ngʼiya,
Jopinje mamoko nochak oger ohinga maru
Dhorangeyeni biro siko ka oyaw,
Nimar ogendini kata pinjeruodhi ma ok notini norum;
Duongʼ mar Lebanon nobini,
Yawuot joma ne osandi nobi iri kakulore e nyimi;
Kata obedo ni osejwangʼi kendo osechayi,
Ibiro madho chak mag pinje mi
Kar mula anakelni dhahabu
Timbe mahundu ok nochak owinji e pinyu,
Wangʼ chiengʼ ok nobed lerni mar odiechiengʼ
Wangʼ chiengʼ ok nochak opodhi
Omiyo jogi duto nobed joma kare
Ngʼat matinie kuomu nolokre oganda mangʼeny,
